text: First it was Buffy the Vampire Slayer, Futurama and Bob ’ s Burgers. Now 30 Rock is the newest series to leave Netflix, the streaming service has confirmed. There were early rumors that 30 Rock would be leaving earlier this month, but Netflix has just confirmed that the show will be removed due to a license expiration. “ 30 Rock will be rolling off the service in October, ” a statement originally reported by Vulture reads, which Polygon has confirmed. “ The license for a TV series or movie is for a set period of time, which means every title eventually comes up for renewal. At that point we take a variety of factors into account to determine if we will renew the title. As we expand our content portfolio, our goal is to continue offering great movies and TV series for our members, while also providing
